title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Handle objections before they happen. Everything you need to know about our SaaS template

pricing.question: What's included in the template?
pricing.answer: Complete source code, authentication system, payment integration, database setup, deployment guides, and comprehensive documentation.

features.question: Do I get lifetime updates?
features.answer: Yes! All plans include free updates for the specified period. Pro and Enterprise plans get extended update periods.

support.question: What kind of support do you provide?
support.answer: We provide email support for all customers, with priority support for Pro and Enterprise customers. Enterprise customers also get dedicated support.

integration.question: How easy is it to integrate with existing systems?
integration.answer: Very easy! Our template is built with modern APIs and follows industry standards, making integration straightforward with most existing systems.

customization.question: Is the code customizable?
customization.answer: Yes, the code is fully customizable. It's built with modern, clean architecture that makes it easy to modify and extend.

deployment.question: How do I deploy the application?
deployment.answer: We provide comprehensive deployment guides for Vercel, AWS, and other platforms. Most deployments can be done with just a few clicks.

updates.question: How often do you release updates?
updates.answer: We release updates regularly, typically monthly for bug fixes and quarterly for new features. All customers get notified of updates.

refund.question: Do you offer refunds?
refund.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the template, we'll provide a full refund.
